name: getCuratedPodcastById
description:
Get detailed meta data of all podcasts in a specific curated list.
This endpoint returns same data as https://www.listennotes.com/curated-podcasts/

id.description: id for a specific curated list of podcasts. You can get the id from the response of `GET /search?type=curated` or `GET /curated_podcasts`.

$ul: **id**: Curated list id, which can be used to further fetch detailed curated list metadata via `GET /curated_podcasts/{id}`.
**listennotes_url**: The url of this curated list on [ListenNotes.com](https://www.ListenNotes.com).
**podcasts**: Complete meta data of all podcasts in this curated list.
**pub_date_ms**: Published date of this curated list. In milliseconds.
**source_domain**: The domain name of the source of this curated list.
**source_url**: Url of the source of this curated list.
**total**: The total number of podcasts in this curated list.
